serverInfo.name: OneDrive-OpenSkills
serverInfo.title: OneDrive OpenSkills
serverInfo.description: Read OpenSkills (SKILL.md) instructions stored in the user's OneDrive /skills folder.

instructions: Read-only OpenSkills access. Skills are stored under /skills in the user's default OneDrive. Use onedrive_openskills_list to enumerate skills and onedrive_openskills_read / onedrive_openskills_read_file to retrieve SKILL.md or a relative file within a skill folder.
